title: SMS about Gift card : BookMyShow Support Centre
category: BookMyShow Gift Card : BookMyShow Support Centre
body:
Will I get an SMS prior to the gift card delivery?
Of course, the receiver needs to be aware that something special is been done by someone.
Once you purchase a gift card sender gets an Invoice Id in SMS/Email.
You being the sender, we do inform you via Email post the delivery is done.
The receiver gets an SMS alert to his/her surprise.
Any more details, please check the mailbox.
